works.description:
The text, which can be viewed at the URL below, is all taken without my permission or knowledge, from one of my personal blog posts. It's copied almost verbatim. The plagiarists tacked on "Dresses dresses dresses" to the beginning of the post title, but from there, even their title "dresses dresses dresses rising like meringue to hindsight bride's macaron challenge" is identical to my "Rising Like Meringue to Hindsight Bride's Macaron Challenge." 
The plagiarized text continues from the first line to the last on this page:

http://sunset-sunrise.com/dresses-dresses-dresses-rising-like-meringue-to-hindsight-brides-macaron-challenge/

An excerpt from the Sunset-Sunrise.com website:
"Tomorrow I’ll be within the kitchen attempting to master the Macaron. Christie O. from The Hindsight Bride challenged me to create my confectionery nemesis two days ago simply because I’ve professed a stubborn dislike of them. They’re as ubiquitous as Mason jars, as prevalent as peonies, and I think SMP secretly stands for Merely Macaron Porn."
